title: JACoinj
author: JACoinj
content: Hallo guys, i created a crypto in Dec 7,2022, named Litelebanoncoin, its a crypto based in lebanon. reply a comment about it

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Is there anywhere I can read detailed information about your cryptocurrency? What opinion do you want to hear if you have not provided any data about your cryptocurrency. What can say without knowing what to talk about? Could you provide details about your cryptocurrency?

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: JACoinj on December 17, 2022, 08:09:25 PMHallo guys, i created a crypto in Dec 7,2022, named Litelebanoncoin, its a crypto based in lebanon. reply a comment about itI've never heard of your currency, are you the CEO? I even searched on Google and did not find any search results, I think that your currency is not listed on any platform, Have you created a special site for it? I created a number of currencies years ago through a website at a cost of less than $5 per coin, but it was only for the sake of trying, anyone can create their own currency, but for the currency project to succeed requires many factors, the most important of which is community confidence and a unique idea. The name of your currency contains the name of the state of Lebanon, and I think that if you are Lebanese, there is a problem that will prevent you from displaying your identity and the identity of your team because the Lebanese government has issued laws banning cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Quote from: JACoinj on December 17, 2022, 08:09:25 PMHallo guys, i created a crypto in Dec 7,2022, named Litelebanoncoin, its a crypto based in lebanon. reply a comment about itThis is not the way to introduce your token, what’s the purpose of creating your own token?Do you mind to share more information about this one, share the site and the purpose of this token so we can know it the project is worth to read or just a waste of time because it can possibly turn into a scam token.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: JACoinj on December 17, 2022, 08:09:25 PMHallo guys, i created a crypto in Dec 7,2022, named Litelebanoncoin, its a crypto based in lebanon. reply a comment about itWe can’t comment about the project if there is no details about it and if there’s no provided link. You created your own token and I hope its a good one because creating your own token is so easy nowadays. If Lebanon is a crypto friendly, then that can be a good opportunity for you to maximize this project, just give more information next time.
